product.title: Happy Birthday Bunting
product.description: Forget the disposable decor that only lasts for one party and string this baby up for every birthday until you're 100 (or older)! Our colorful bunting is easy to store or leave it up all year because it looks cool and you deserve to be celebrated. Size: 38 inches long; pennants: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt with screen-printed artwork Color: Crimson, Maroon, Old Gold, Forest, Turquoise, and Navy bodies; Cream details
product.descriptionHtml:
Forget the disposable decor that only lasts for one party and string this baby up for every birthday until you're 100 (or older)! Our colorful bunting is easy to store or leave it up all year because it looks cool and you deserve to be celebrated.

Size: 38 inches long; pennants: 4" x 9"

Material:  Cut-and-sewn wool felt with screen-printed artwork

Color: Crimson, Maroon, Old Gold, Forest, Turquoise, and Navy bodies; Cream details
